name: mahad-suite-app
description: Ma'had Suite Application - Static frontend with Supabase backend

scripts.build: rm -rf public && mkdir public && cp index.html public/ && cp index.tsx public/ && cp App.tsx public/ && cp types.ts public/ && cp metadata.json public/ && cp index.css public/ && cp -R components public/ && cp -R hooks public/ && cp -R services public/
